Posted via LiveJournal app for iPhone.

having bad dreams since friday night.
the last one was so vivid, so real.. that i sobbed uncontrollably even after waking up.
mom immediately asked, "dreamt about what, work?"

everyone who sees me often, knows it's work that's affecting me.

sigh. thou i seldom mention anything about work with my family and friends, practically everyone.. it doesn't mean that things are fine.
perhaps it has reached a stage where, i don't know how to tell anyone anymore.
i can grumble to my mom, that work is so tiring. but i don't know exactly how to let her understand, how/why it is. it's such a long story.. i can complain to my friends, about nasty colleagues.. but seriously, it goes deeper than that. it's not just 1, 2, or 3 of them.. and it's not just that few incidents.. it's a very very huge built-up. we meet so many people, do so many things that i don't know how/where to start the things i go through each day..


wake me up when july comes..

how many chances can one give?..

Posted via LiveJournal.app.

dizziness.
nightmares for the past 36hrs..

cant believe i slept thru almost 30hrs.. nothing else other than a dinner, mg, n getting brushed by a reversing car.

can I sleep everything off?


I wish 6am tmr will never come.

Posted via LiveJournal.app.

nice catching up with the girls over breakfast..
i love seeing new bags!! even if they're not mine. wahaha.

*mental note to self, no more eyeing new bags! :/
i shouldn't be getting anymore bags or clutches or whatever..
but i couldn't help it at times.

got this last week.


aye, but at least this is darn cheap.
so i don't have to worry about it getting dirtied at all! unlike my bb :(


backdate a lil..
mommy's birthday @ yun nan 

we chose that place, so that i can UTIlIZE my membership.. ahaha.
no la, somehow the older generation has this good impression of yunnan garden restaurants.. perhaps they were good in the past??

the good thing about the place is it was not crowded at all. opens only on weekdays iirc? we went on a friday night and only half the restaurant was filled.

service was quite prompt. one of the managers even brought us for a 'tour' of their private/karaoke rooms and helped us took some photos in it. it was kind of awkward, haha, but the person was super friendly.

food variety is so-so. typical chinese restaurant food. nothing fanciful.
the fish and sweet/sour pork is good! crispy and not too much flour. sauce was just nice, not overwhelming sweet or sour. the abalone is very tiny -.- newmoon can abalone might taste better haha. prawns were quite fresh, and smells damn nice! :) yummms~!
there was this coffee flavoured ribs, which has a bitter aftertaste. don't really like it, not a fan of bitterness in my food. just like bitter durian and bitter bittergourds.
dessert is bad :/ i thought it could 'wash' away the coffee taste. but..
we asked for cold mango pomelo sago. what came, tasted like mango syrup mixed with bitter pomelo bits and left in the kitchen til it's room temperature :( not yummy or nicely chilled. >:0



anyway, went shopping with my mom last night n we reached home at only 1230am!! goodness.
but i'm not complaining at all. cos there's not much time left for me to walk around as i like..

i got no idea how to fix the film in my new diana! :/
that's the result of not being hardworking. i haven't touch a non-digital cam for soo damn long.

oh ya.


happy halloween

my new toy!

Posted via LiveJournal.app.

casual day out~
i look damn tired out without makeup :(


 
New hangout place, Ash & rock!
they have yummy chicken cutlet! i'm not a fan of chicken usually.. esp one with tomato sauce, but the chicken cutlet there was on promo and mann, i made a right gamble! it was juicy and tender on the inside, cripsy on the outside. and a tinge of sourness just now ;)
fish and chips was good too!

they had cool bottles of cokes too. tried their honey beetroot drink which was quite sweet, probably cos of the huge amount of honey.


been eating lots recently. sh*t, face getting rounder... :/ :/
 
dessert after dinner that day, and look at the amount of gelato the girl gave! (cos i casually mentioned their boss name :P)

 
see!
either they had changed the policy of flattening their gelatos before serving, or.. she was just being nice ;)


newly permed hair!
woo!

abit messy thou. *pls ignore my cat-look. thkuverymuch.
i need hair treatment and colouring! :/
any good place for these, lemme know! :D  



guess where i went today...?

 




ta-da!

start of healthy lifestyle.
it's a uber nice gym! *motivated*




familiar?
back to peak period at work :/

i wish x'mas will come quickly! (:



oh. i just saw weiming walked past. l.o.l.

Posted via LiveJournal.app.

everything felt wrong since the moment I woke up today.
and indeed, everything's not going smooth.

nobody cares.
everyone just wants me to work for them and do what they want.

I don't wanna give a damn anymore.

Posted via LiveJournal.app.

it's amazing how, when i want to pick myself up again, somebody comes along and gives a helping hand.
eventually, it's still up to me. but at least the person gave an very apt advice so that i can start.

D&D went okay. first visit to MBS! only wish i had more time to explore around.
went home hungry cos each dish took an avg of 1/2 hr to reach us :/ and it'd be cleared within mins while we were elsewhere taking photos. boo :( but otherwise, those i've tried were quite yummy :)
programs were so-so. las vegas-like dancers..runway show.. i doubt anyone was paying attention thou. only until the segment on retirement of the managing partner. pretty touching.  scary thou to think about our staff directory photos appearing on a collage of his face :/

didn't sleep much that night.
ended up not being about to go for main comm outing :(


can someone enlighten me on what's happening to me?
is it the wrong environment? or wrong perception on my own?

i don't wanna feel this way everyday. and it gets worse on sundays :(

2nd day of a new resolution! i wanna stick to it for the whole of Sept!
jia you jia you jia you!


almost thought i have to go back to nafa.
thank god.
"Nobody at their deathbed ever wished they had spend more time at the office"

tcm again.cupping.pain.fuglybruises.pain.sleeplessness.pain.

can i quit and do something i like for a year?
to come back after a year.
would that be possible?

im sooo hooked onto this!

muahahaha!

went for tcm yesterday evening, which resulted in a severely bruised leg from then on. and ache/pain even when i stand still. and slight fever. sighh.
the treatment had hurt so freaking much that i screamed/cried out in pain uncontrollably. paiseh ttm *'.'*


last wednesday marked the 1st anniversary of my <S>career</s> <S>working</s> shitty life.
had super xiong training whole of the week.
met daughter for lunch (lucky girl who's going to start work only like later).
received more news of ppl leaving. currently, half out of the 15 headcount we had has left/is leaving.

we have realised,
people leave not becos of better job opportunities. but rather, they're so sick and tired of the environment here. which i find quite true.
the sector wouldn't be shitty,
if we have nicer seniors/mgrs around.
if we have less politics.
if we have less gossips/backstabbings.

anyway, 1st anniversary means, start of the cycle again.
back to centennial.
back to a 8-month engagement.
back to the nightmare.

i am so gonna hate working with the new mgr.
goodness.

i think i found what i need :D







http://www.whoa-ho.com/shoewheel.html

i have a new boss named matthias.
don't understand why the whole world calls him mer-thigh-yers.

buffet with him, the partner, my fav sm, and clients at furama few days back.
the sashimi was soooooo good! :D
desserts were nice, except for the plate of probably 0.5kg of durian paste which looked like, quote from somebody, "a lump of shit."
and it doesn't have the durian scent at all.
food was quite okay. it's one of the few places with halal food so that rina can join us :)

overall, nice. but i think it's only worth the 1-for-1 price for most cc. which is about 30+ per pax. otherwise, i probably wouldn't go back to the place again.



had viral infection the next morning after the buffet.
i had thought it's food poisoning or something. wahahaa. but wells, apparently it's cos of the rain i got last week. 
anyway, it was the very nice doc on duty again :) so i booked an appt for surgery/consultation at the same time (finally).
the nurse would call me back within this week.. but i'm beginning to chicken out (again). and i can't decide if mt E, or gleneagles is better. or just the parkway medical clinic which is more convenient :/



i cannot stand ppl who sends me SMSes continuously. every morning/afternoon/after work. sends even when i'm not replying at all.
#$@^!&*



1 of my friends tendered yesterday.
1 of them left officially yesterday.


when is it my turn?

was looking through family photos folder.
so,
here are more collages teehee :)



seems to be our fav family dinner place. convenient and yummy!


RWS.


small bday celebration~


this will make car lovers go crazieeee, lol.



and mel saw the orange one just now!

don't wanna be sick n pale. looking forward to 2 weeks later!

so a private yacht is nothing other than being expensive. had a boring night.

Posted via LiveJournal.app.

i hate my job..

i hate my client.

i hate being 'homeless', always shifting around.

i hate clients.

i hate being lent from one to another.

i hate clients.

i hate picking up shit others have left behind.

i hate clients.

i hate being screamed at by clients, just because they feel like.

i hate meeting incompetent and lazy clients.

i hate being accused.

i hate being degraded.

i hate it when people make sexual reference about my work/words, in office.

i hate working for charity org or IPCs, thou i would jolly well work for charity.

i hate clients.

i hate being alone, having no one to turn to.

i hate clients.

i hate carrying files n laptop for work.

i hate being caught in jams at work.

i hate tying leadsheets.

i hate clients.

i hate tying things from last year to the previous quarter and to this year. esp when it's anyhow done in the past. wtf?

i hate the fact that, i can go to work at 730am, but i can never knock off at 530pm.

i hate people comparing my problems with theirs various other problem and tell me i'm better off than them. wtf? it doesn't help at all. apple to apple please.

i hate clients.

i really hate clients.

i hate that nobody cares, even though everyone talks about giving work-life balance.

i hate the fucking stupid hierachy system.

i hate it more when people abuse it.

i hate the phrase "shit flows downwards".

i hate my job.

i hate clients.

i keep forgetting if i've taken my pills.
just like how granny forgets her meals! 















:X

just when i was hoping for a REAL escapade, it came to me (:
finally a trip without having to plan single thing, no worries about expenses and itinerary, and being chaffeured throughout is enjoyment ttm!

go-kart was superrrr shiok. esp the race part, lol.
so was impromtu durian experience.
the non-seafood seafood feast was just weird. but yummy anyways.


my HP laptop is dying ): have to send it for servicing for at least 2 weeks! pffft.
was doing a clean-up and back-up for the laptop when i realised i haven't got many photos in my HD. HOW COME??? that kind of disappointment shucks man. just when u finally have time and as so looking forward to view some old pics, you CAN'T FIND IT ANYWHERE in any laptops. roar.

STILL, the backup needs about 5hours? ohmigosh. dunno why so freaking long.
so i decided to do it on monday instead.
probably send the laptop for servicing on tues then.

*prays hard*

discussion meeting was good just now. quite joyous!
i like the 1/2 interaction thingy. instead of just sharings-that-the-presentor-is-not-interested-in-sharing-or-doing-so-for-the-sake-of-doing-it-and-listeners-not-interested-in-even-pretending-to-listen :X
honestly, the good thing is, the ywd leader wasn't present. no need for anybody to act busy, to spare the awkwardness. ahems.
i hope it continues.











morning gongyo tmr.
and i'm craving for secret recipe after that! (:

rainy day.
sad song.
flu.
medical report from yesterday.

everything makes me depressed again.

i slept my WHOLE morning. seriously.
did gongyo, showered, changed, ate breakfast and med, makeup-ed. even put my my perfume.
but i got so drowsy when i reached the bus stop, that i decided to just head back home again.
made a phonecall, contacted some people.

and hid underneath my blanket right away. 
dead for the next 4-5hours.

i need a short getaway.
to anywhere with no restrictions. no politics. no one telling me what to do, what not to do. no one giving me faces.

sigh.

on a lighter note, i saw this new dslr!



i wannnnnnt! lol.

think it has been out in the market for a while already? but i just got to know about it! it's like so superb la! a mini-sized DLSR!


and sooooo many other stuffs i had been eyeing.






in order of preferences (:
lol.
but reverse order of practicality.


somehow, i always end up not getting it when i have the chance. hurhur.
wait til bonus month! coming soon! *excited*
short trip, short escapade.

broke down in office last night. too much pent up tension.
thankfully most people had left. 

abit of 'counselling' from the manager.. jw got me milo from the vending machine for dinner, and we carried on with work. sad life.

the sis having her birthday celebration overseas and we're intending to surprise her with a cake at the hotel!

i'm super envious.
my birthday was spent working, tired from the previous few days of late nights. my family members were either sleeping/doing their own things/having exams.

what celebration? what cake? i had to dinner alone n wash the dishes in the dark.

sigh.

sucks to be me.


wanted to drop by the pc show to get the lh700.
but i seriously do not wish to see the crowd.
what's more, not yet done with the planning of the trip. haven't changed currency. and tired physically/mentally.

so much for bringing the family for a holiday. it seems to be adding more pressure than lessening it.

really sucky life.

went to do my hair AGAIN yesterday. 3 days in a row. sigh. more outflow of $.
it's finally acceptable now. waiting for it to grow out. probably in half a year's time.

at least for now, it isn't dropping as much. *hz keeps her fingers crossed*

sigh. 

no more 90bucks haircut ever again pls.
in fact, i should have no more haircuts for the next 2 years!!



on a lighter note,
HK trip in 10days time! wheee~

after..

1 $90+ haircut,
1 night of tears,
1 morning of hoohaa,
1 phonecall form the MD,
1 rectification,

i'm tired.
